#summary The onblur event fires when an element loses focus.
#labels about-dom,is-dom-event,from-w3c

== Usage ==

== Event targets ==

The `onblur` event fires on these objects:

  * [HtmlElements all elements]
  * [WindowObject window]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
